程序包的使用
cardgame

  • cardgame使用的cardgame中的类
    类 说明
    Card
    la class card shows the attribute of cards, color, shape and the background
    Chessboard
    la class chessboard contains the methods of the way how we to store the chessboard
    COLOR
    Enumeration of card colors
    Deck
    Class Deck is the place of card where player draw the card,we use linkedlist for storing deck
    FILLED
    Enumeration of whether the card is filled or not filled
    Play
    Class Play is used to create player.
    SHAPE
    Enumeration of card shapes.
    Strategy
    Strategy mode interface.
